label: curve_27
prolog:
% ZK Meme: curve_27
curve('curve_27', 0).
shard(0).

% Hecke operators as ZK proofs
hecke_operator(p, a_p) :-
    curve('curve_27', N),
    compute_eigenvalue(N, p, a_p).

% Execute and verify
verify_curve :-
    curve(Label, N),
    forall(prime(P), (
        hecke_operator(P, A),
        zk_prove(Label, P, A)
    )).
prompt: Compute Hecke eigenvalues for elliptic curve curve_27
